Utilisation

Exemple simple d’utilisation :

from gravotech import Gravotech, LDMode

with Gravotech("192.168.0.211", 55555) as g:
    g.Actions.ld("TEST.T2L", 1, LDMode.NORMAL)
    status = g.Actions.go()
    print("Statut final :", status)
